en: Check the declaration to ensure that all the required data elements have been completed in full. For example, if declaring a party name and address, then name, street and number, country and postcode must be completed
cy: Gwiriwch y datganiad i sicrhau bod yr holl elfennau data gofynnol wediâu cwblhauân llawn. Er enghraifft, os ydych yn datgan enwâr parti aâi gyfeiriad, yna rhaid cwblhau enw, stryd a rhif, gwlad a chod post

en: Go through the declaration from the beginning to find where you have entered details that are not permitted. Some details are not permitted at item level, only at header level - this is specified by an X or Y at the start of the value sent
cy: Ewch drwyâr datganiad oâr dechrau i ddod o hyd i ble rydych wedi nodi manylion nad ydynt yn cael eu caniatÃ¡u. Ni chaniateir rhai manylion ar lefel yr eitem, dim ond ar lefel y pennyn - nodir hyn gan X neu Y ar ddechrauâr gwerth a anfonwyd

en: You have exceeded the limit for one of the fields on the declaration. For example, only 1 preference code can be declared against an item
cy: Rydych wedi mynd y tu hwnt iâr terfyn ar gyfer un oâr meysydd ar y datganiad. Er enghraifft, dim ond 1 cod ffafriaeth y gellir ei ddatgan yn erbyn eitem

en: A commodity code error is likely to be caused by missing or incorrect additional codes to the commodity code - these are the national additional codes or TARIC additional codes
cy: Maeân debygol y bydd gwall cod nwyddau yn cael ei hachosi gan godau ychwanegol sydd ar goll neu syân anghywir iâr cod nwyddau - dymaâr codau ychwanegol cenedlaethol neuâr codau TARIC ychwanegol

en: One of the data elements does not comply with the minimum/maximum number of characters or uses characters not permitted. For example, the country code field with the address must only use alphabetic characters
cy: Nid yw un oâr elfennau data yn cydymffurfio Ã¢âr isafswm/uchafswm o gymeriadau neuân defnyddio cymeriadau na chaniateir. Er enghraifft, maeân rhaid i faes cod y wlad gydaâr cyfeiriad ddefnyddio cymeriadauâr wyddor yn unig

en: A code used in the declaration is either not a recognised code or is not a code permitted on the particular declaration. For example, a document code which is only permitted on export declarations has been declared on an import declaration
cy: Mae cod a ddefnyddir yn y datganiad naill aiân god nad ywân gydnabyddedig neu nid ywân god a ganiateir ar y datganiad penodol. Er enghraifft, mae cod dogfen syân cael ei ganiatÃ¡u ar ddatganiadau allforioân unig wediâi ddatgan ar ddatganiad mewnforio

en: A negative amount has been declared for writing off a licence. The quantity being written off for a licence must be equal to or greater than zero
cy: Mae swm negyddol wediâi ddatgan ar gyfer dileu trwydded. Maeân rhaid iâr swm syân cael ei ddileu ar gyfer trwydded fod yn hafal i neuân fwy na sero

en: The deductions you declared may exceed the value of the items. See CDS Tariff completion notes for data element 4/9. Apportioning a deduction across mutiple items must not reduce the value of any single item to zero or a negative amount
cy: Maeân bosibl bod y didyniadau a ddatganwyd gennych yn fwy na gwerth yr eitemau. Gweler nodiadau cwblhau Tariff CDS ar gyfer elfen ddata 4/9. Maeân rhaid i ddosraniad didyniad ar draws nifer o eitemau beidio Ã¢ gostwng gwerth unrhyw eitem unigol i sero neu swm negyddol

en: Amend data element 1/9 to match the number of declared goods items on the declaration
cy: Diwygiwch elfen ddata 1/9 i gyd-fynd Ã¢ nifer yr eitemau o nwyddau a ddatganwyd ar y datganiad

en: The combination of procedure code and additional procedure code is either invalid or is not permitted on this type of declaration
cy: Mae cyfuniad y cod gweithdrefn aâr cod gweithdrefn ychwanegol naill aiân annilys neu heb ei ganiatÃ¡u ar y math hwn o ddatganiad

en: All items on the declaration must derive from the same procedure category. For example if one item has requested procedure 40, then another item must not have a requested procedure of 71 because this would require a different declaration type
cy: Maeân rhaid i bob eitem ar y datganiad ddeillio oâr un categori gweithdrefn. Er enghraifft, os yw un eitem wedi gofyn am weithdrefn 40, yna maeân rhaid i eitem arall beidio Ã¢ chael gweithdrefn y gofynnwyd amdani o 71 oherwydd byddai angen math o ddatganiad gwahanol ar gyfer hyn

en: Net mass declared is greater than the gross mass declared.
cy: Maeâr mÃ s net a ddatganwyd yn fwy naâr mÃ s gros a ddatganwyd.

en: A person linked to a different EORI number or different identification details cannot send a request to HMRC about the declaration, such as requesting a cancellation. Only the original declarant can send requests
cy: Ni all person syân gysylltiedig Ã¢ rhif EORI gwahanol neu fanylion adnabod gwahanol anfon cais at CThEF am y datganiad, megis gofyn am ganslo. Dim ond y datganydd gwreiddiol all anfon ceisiadau

en: Check your amendment request. For example, you cannot change a declaration from prelodged (D) to arrived (A) through amendment, only through goods arrival
cy: Gwiriwch eich cais am ddiwygiad. Er enghraifft, ni allwch newid datganiad o wediâi gyflwyno ymlaen llaw (D) i wedi cyrraedd (A) trwy ei ddiwygio, dim ond wrth i nwyddau cyrraedd

en: You used the same local reference number (LRN) within 48 hours. Change the LRN or add a version number at the end using letters and numbers only.
cy: Defnyddioch yr un cyfeirnod lleol (LRN) o fewn 48 awr. Newidiwch yr LRN neu ychwanegwch rif y fersiwn ar y diwedd gan ddefnyddio llythrennau a rhifau yn unig.

en: An EORI or VAT number included on the declaration is not recognised
cy: Nid yw rhif EORI neu rif TAW sydd wediâi gynnwys ar y datganiad yn cael ei adnabod

en:
You declared a licence number that is failing validation for one of these reasons:

Expiry date is in the past
Licence ID not recognised
Licence DUCR not matching declaration DUCR
Licence ID does not match EORI declared
Licence declared has insufficient balance remaining
Licence does not match country of origin specified
Licence does not permit quantity declared.
cy:
Gwnaethoch ddatgan rhif trwydded syân methu cael ei dilysu am un oâr rhesymau hyn:

Maeâr dyddiad dod i ben yn y gorffennol
Nid yw Dynodydd y drwydded yn cael ei adnabod
Nid yw trwydded DUCR yn cyd-fynd Ã¢ datganiad DUCR
Nid yw Dynodydd y drwydded yn cyd-fynd Ã¢ ddatgan EORI
Nid oes gan y drwydded sydd wediâi datgan ddigon o falans yn weddill
Nid ywâr drwydded yn cyd-fynd Ã¢âr wlad tarddiad a bennir
Nid ywâr drwydded yn caniatÃ¡uâr swm sydd wediâi ddatgan.

en: You declared an authorisation that has expired; or the reference number does not belong to the party on the declaration; or the reference number provided is not recognised
cy: Gwnaethoch ddatgan awdurdodiad sydd wedi dod i ben; neu nid ywâr cyfeirnod yn perthyn iâr parti ar y datganiad; neu nid ywâr cyfeirnod a roddir yn cael ei adnabod

en: VAT number is not a valid destination for VAT transfer
cy: Nid yw rhif TAW yn gyrchfan ddilys ar gyfer trosglwyddo TAW

en: A goods arrival notification must follow a pre-lodged declaration
cy: Maeân rhaid i hysbysiad o nwyddau syân cyrraedd ddilyn datganiad a gyflwynwyd ymlaen llaw

en: The request to arrive, amend or cancel declaration is invalid because the declaration cannot be found or is in a state that will not allow the requested action
cy: Maeâr cais i gyrraedd, diwygio neu ganslo datganiad yn annilys oherwydd ni ellir dod o hyd iâr datganiad neu nad yw mewn cyflwr syân caniatÃ¡uâr camau y gofynnwyd amdanynt

en: The date when goods were accepted for the simplified declaration or EIDR must not be more than 365 days in the past (or 200 days for a type Q declaration) and also cannot be in the future (cannot be before the goods are accepted)
cy: Ni all y dyddiad pan dderbyniwyd y nwyddau ar gyfer y datganiad symlach neu EIDR fod yn fwy na 365 diwrnod yn y gorffennol (neu 200 diwrnod ar gyfer datganiad math Q) ac ni all ychwaith fod yn y dyfodol (ni all fod cyn iâr nwyddau gael eu derbyn)

en: The goods item number declared is larger than the total number of goods items on the declaration.
cy: Mae rhif yr eitem o nwyddau a ddatganwyd yn fwy na chyfanswm yr eitemau o nwyddau ar y datganiad.

en:
You have declared a value and repeated it, when that is not allowed.

Check the entries for these data elements:
1/11 - additional procedure code can only be used once on each item
1/6 - item number cannot be repeated on the declaration
2/3 -ARC number declared with document code C651 can only be used on one declaration
4/9 - addition or deduction code can only be used once at header level or once with each item
2/3 - licence ID cannot be repeated on the same item.
cy:
Rydych wedi datgan gwerth aâi ailadrodd, pan na chaniateir hynny.

Gwiriwch y cofnodion am yr elfennau data hyn:
1/11 - dim ond unwaith y gellir defnyddio cod gweithdrefn ychwanegol ar bob eitem
1/6 - ni ellir ailadrodd rhif yr eitem ar y datganiad
2/3 -gellir defnyddioâr rhif ARC a ddatganwyd gyda chod dogfen C651 ar un datganiad yn unig
4/9 - dim ond unwaith y gellir defnyddio cod ychwanegu neu ddidynnu ar lefel y pennyn neu unwaith gyda phob eitem
2/3 - ni ellir ailadrodd Dynodydd y drwydded ar yr un eitem.

en: On amendments the same data element can only be amended once per amendment submission
cy: O ran diwygiadau, dim ond unwaith y gellir diwygioâr un elfen ddata fesul pob cyflwyniad diwygio

en: Goods arrival notification has been submitted 30 or more days after the date the declaration was originally submitted and received
cy: Mae hysbysiad o nwyddau syân cyrraedd wediâi gyflwyno 30 diwrnod neuân fwy ar Ã´l y dyddiad y cyflwynwyd y datganiad yn wreiddiol ac y daeth hwnnw i law

en: The amendment must be submitted using the same submission channel as the original declaration
cy: Maeân rhaid cyflwynoâr diwygiad gan ddefnyddioâr un sianel gyflwyno Ã¢âr datganiad gwreiddiol

en: There is an outstanding cancellation or amendment request. A new request cannot be submitted until a response is received to your previous request
cy: Mae cais i ganslo neu ddiwygio sydd heb ei glirio. Ni ellir cyflwyno cais newydd hyd nes y derbynnir ymateb iâch cais blaenorol

en: Different quota order numbers cannot be declared on the same item. Note that declaration will be rejected if there is more than one quota order number in data element 8/1 for an item
cy: Ni ellir datgan rhifau archebion y cwota gwahanol ar yr un eitem. Sylwer y bydd y datganiad yn cael ei wrthod os oes mwy nag un rhif archeb y cwota yn elfen ddata 8/1 am eitem

en:
A MUCR is only for the consolidation of several declarations. Do not add a MUCR unless you are consolidating.

On a single declaration (with no MUCR) you may add different items with different commodity codes, as long as all of them are being exported to the same consignee (party buying and receiving the goods).

You will find more information in the Notes section for data element 2/1 in the completion guide
cy:
Dim ond ar gyfer cyfuno sawl datganiad y mae MUCR. Peidiwch ag ychwanegu MUCR oni bai eich bod yn cyfuno.

Ar ddatganiad unigol (heb MUCR), maeân bosibl i chi ychwanegu gwahanol eitemau gyda gwahanol godau nwyddau, cyn belled Ã¢ bod pob un ohonynt yn cael eu hallforio iâr un derbynnydd (y parti syân prynu a chael y nwyddau).

Fe welwch ragor o wybodaeth yn yr adran Nodiadau ar gyfer elfen ddata 2/1 yn y canllaw ar gyfer cwblhau

en: Goods arrival notification has been submitted after 30 days from the date the declaration was originally submitted and received. You will find your declaration in the 'Rejected' tab and you can resubmit it and send a new arrival message
cy: Mae hysbysiad o nwyddau syân cyrraedd wediâi gyflwyno ar Ã´l 30 diwrnod iâr dyddiad y cyflwynwyd y datganiad yn wreiddiol ac ydaeth hwnnw i law. Fe welwch eich datganiad yn y tab âWediâi wrthodâ a gallwch ei ailgyflwyno ac anfon neges cyrhaeddiad newydd

en: Declaration must include at least one item and every item must include a valid procedure code
cy: Maeân rhaid iâr datganiad gynnwys o leiaf un eitem ac maeân rhaid i bob eitem gynnwys cod gweithdrefn dilys

en: Enter the declaration type - standard, simplified (regular use), simplified (occasional use), supplementary or clearance, and prelodged or arrived. See data element 1/2 for the correct codes
cy: Nodwch y math o ddatganiad - safonol, symlach (defnydd rheolaidd), symlach (defnydd achlysurol), atodol neu glirio, ac wedi cyflwyno ymlaen llaw neu wedi cyrraedd. Gweler elfen ddata 1/2 ar gyfer y codau cywir

en: For example, a document code has an incompatible document status
cy: Er enghraifft, mae gan god dogfen statws dogfen anghydnaws

en: See data element 4/14 for the requirement
cy: Gweler elfen ddata 4/14 ar gyfer y gofyniad

en: Packaging quantity cannot be zero for all packages for combined packaging
cy: Ni all swm y deunydd pacio fod yn sero ar gyfer pob pecyn ar gyfer deunydd pacio cyfunol

en: For example, you have entered a value that requires another field to be completed, or makes another field invalid
cy: Er enghraifft, rydych wedi nodi gwerth syân gofyn am gwblhau maes arall, neuân gwneud maes arall yn annilys

en: Check the data element completion guide for exports from the CDS Tariff. This tells you the exact requirements for each field. In particular see the data element completion guide for data elements 3/9, 5/8, 5/14, 7/10 and 8/5.
cy: Gwiriwch y canllaw ar gyfer cwblhau elfennau data ar gyfer allforion oâr Tariff CDS. Mae hyn yn rhoi gwybod i chi yr union ofynion ar gyfer pob maes. Yn benodol, gweler y canllaw ar gyfer cwblhau elfennau data am elfen ddata 3/9, 5/8, 5/14, 7/10 ac 8/5.

en:
This could be an unacceptable combination of values at header and item level, for example gross weight has been declared at both header and item level.

Or EORI as well as name and address has been declared for consignee, consignor or buyer
cy:
Gallai hyn fod yn gyfuniad annerbyniol o werthoedd ar lefel y pennyn aâr eitem, er enghraifft mae pwysau gros wediâu datgan ar lefel y pennyn aâr eitem.

Neu fod yr EORI yn ogystal Ã¢âr enw aâr cyfeiriad wediâu datgan ar gyfer y derbynnydd, yr anfonydd neuâr prynwr

en:
A value is missing or has been entered at the wrong level.

Check these data elements:

2/1, (31 or 3/2), and 8/5 must be declared at least once at either header or item level.
7/10 must be declared at least once at header or item level if
7/2 is coded 1. 3/15 or 3/16 must be declared at header level
cy:
Mae gwerth ar goll neu wediâi nodi ar y lefel anghywir.

Gwiriwch yr elfennau data hyn:

Maeân rhaid datgan 2/1, (31 neu 3/2), ac 8/5 o leiaf unwaith ar naill ai lefel y pennyn neuâr eitem.
Maeân rhaid datgan 7/10 o leiaf unwaith ar lefel y pennyn neuâr eitem os yw 
7/2 yn cael ei chodioân 1. Maeân rhaid datgan 3/15 neu 3/16 ar lefel y pennyn

en: Check the data element completion guide for the CDS Tariff, and declare one or the other but not both. For example, exporter, consignor and carrier, complete either an EORI or name and address. See Tariff for specific requirements
cy: Gwiriwch y canllaw ar gyfer cwblhau elfennau data ar gyfer y Tariff CDS, a datgan yr un neuâr llall ond nid y ddau. Er enghraifft, mae allforiwr, anfonydd a chludwr yn cwblhau naill ai EORI neu enw a chyfeiriad. Gweler y Tariff ar gyfer gofynion penodol

en: If one of the fields is completed the other should not have a value and should therefore be removed. For example, a document code and document status have been entered but the status is not required for this code. This can also indicate that a data element has been declared but is not permitted on this type of declaration
cy: Os bydd un oâr meysydd yn cael eu cwblhau ni ddylaiâr llall fod Ã¢ gwerth ac felly dylid ei ddileu. Er enghraifft, mae cod dogfen a statws dogfen wediâu nodi ond nid oes angen y statws ar gyfer y cod hwn. Gall hyn hefyd nodi bod elfen ddata wediâi datgan ond ni chaniateir honno ar y math hwn o ddatganiad

en: For example, if a party name is declared then all fields of the address must be declared, when completing an ID in data element 7/14, a type code must also be provided with it. When manually completing tax line data elements, all the appropriate data elements must be declared
cy: Er enghraifft, os yw enw parti yn cael ei ddatgan, yna maeân rhaid datgan holl feysydd y cyfeiriad, wrth gwblhau Dynodydd yn elfen ddata 7/14, maeân rhaid rhoi cod math hefyd gydag ef. Wrth gwblhau elfennau data llinell dreth Ã¢ llaw, maeân rhaid datgan yr holl elfennau data priodol

en: Two values you declared are incompatible. For example, a data element is declared at both header and item levels but only one level is permissible
cy: Mae dau werth a ddatganwyd gennych yn anghydnaws. Er enghraifft, datganir elfen ddata ar lefel y pennyn aâr eitem ond dim ond un lefel syân cael ei chaniatÃ¡u

en:
You have used a mix of addition or deduction codes for an item that is not permitted. Certain addition/deduction codes cannot be declared together.

Additions and deductions should only be declared at header level where they apply to all good items on the customs declaration.

Each addition or deduction code can only be declared once at header level. The same addition or deduction code cannot then be declared at item level as well.

If a specific addition or deduction is being declared at item level, that addition or deduction may only be declared once per item
cy:
Rydych wedi defnyddio cymysgedd o godau ychwanegu neu ddidynnu ar gyfer eitem lle na chaniateir hynny. Ni ellir datgan rhai codau ychwanegu/didynnu gydaâi gilydd.

Dylai ychwanegiadau a didyniadau gael eu datgan ar lefel y pennyn yn unig lle maent yn berthnasol i bob eitem o nwyddau ar y datganiad tollau.

Dim ond unwaith y gellir datgan pob cod ychwanegu neu ddidynnu. Ni ellir, wedyn, ddatgan yr un cod ychwanegu neu ddidynnu ar lefel yr eitem yn ogystal.

Os yw ychwanegiad neu ddidyniad penodol yn cael ei ddatgan ar lefel yr eitem, dim ond unwaith yr eitem y gellir datgan yr ychwanegiad neu ddidyniad hwnnw

en:
You have provided both a country and country group for mandatory data element Preferential Origin.

Where the proof of origin document refers to a group of countries, enter the group of countries by using the relevant Union codes in accordance with the codes listed in Appendix 13: Country Codes

Where data element 5/16 is completed using a preference group code, data element 5/15 must be completed with the specific country of origin for the goods
cy:
Rydych wedi rhoi gwlad a grÅµp gwlad ar gyfer yr elfen ddata orfodol, Tarddiad Ffafriol.

Lle maeâr ddogfen dystiolaeth o darddiad yn cyfeirio at grÅµp o wledydd, nodwch y grÅµp o wledydd drwy ddefnyddioâr codau Undeb perthnasol yn unol Ã¢âr codau a restrir yn Atodiad 13: Codau Gwledydd

Lle cwblheir elfen ddata 5/16 gan ddefnyddio cod grÅµp ffafriol, maeân rhaid cwblhau elfen ddata 5/15 gyda gwlad tarddiad benodol y nwyddau

en: You have provided both consignee name and consignee EORI. Only declare either the EORI or the full name and address of consignee not both. EORI should be declared when known
cy: Rydych wedi darparu enwâr derbynnydd ac EORIâr derbynnydd. Datgenwch naill aiâr EORI neu enw llawn a chyfeiriad y derbynnydd yn unig, nid y ddau. Dylid datgan yr EORI pan fydd yn hysbys

en: You have provided both Carrier name and Carrier EORI. Only declare either the EORI or the full name and address of carrier not both. EORI should be declared when known
cy: Rydych wedi rhoi enwâr Cludwr ac EORIâr Cludwr. Datgenwch naill aiâr EORI neu enw llawn a chyfeiriad y cludwr yn unig, nid y ddau. Dylid datgan yr EORI pan fydd yn hysbys

en: You have declared your additional fiscal party VAT number at both header and item level. It should only be declared at either item or header level. Or you have declared procedure code 1042 and not declared an additional fiscal references ID
cy: Rydych wedi datgan eich rhif TAW cyllidol ychwanegol ar lefel y pennyn aâr eitem. Dylid ei ddatgan ar naill ai lefel y pennyn neu lefel yr eitem yn unig. Neu rydych wedi datgan cod gweithdrefn 1042 a heb ddatgan Dynodydd cyfeirnodau cyllidol ychwanegol

en: To correct this error, complete the EORI in data element 3/19, or the name and address in 3/20, even if they are your own details as the declarant and you are the direct representative
cy: I gywiroâr gwall hwn, cwblhewch yr EORI yn elfen ddata 3/19, neuâr enw aâr cyfeiriad yn 3/20, hyd yn oed os maiâch manylion chi ydyn nhw fel y datganydd a chi ywâr cynrychiolydd uniongyrchol

en: Consigneee party name and address must be declared at either header or item level on a C21e unless the procedure code is 0019
cy: Maeân rhaid datgan enw a chyfeiriad y parti derbynnydd ar naill ai lefel y pennyn neuâr eitem ar C21e oni bai maiâr cod gweithdrefn yw 0019

en: When declaring additional procedure Code 17X on a C21e clearance request, the carrier anme and address or the carrier EORI must be declared at header level
cy: Wrth ddatgan cod gweithdrefn ychwanegol 17X ar gais clirio C21e, maeân rhaid datgan enw a chyfeiriad y cludwr neu EORIâr cludwr ar lefel pennyn

en: Consignee (receiver of goods) and exporter cannot have the same EORI number
cy: PLEASE MANUALLY REPLACE WITH WELSH

en:
You have declared the same party for seller (data element 3/25) and exporter (data element 3/1).

The seller details are only required where the seller is a different party to the exporter.

Where the seller is a different party to the exporter and holds a recognised EORI number, enter the seller’s EORI number in data element 3/25
cy:
You have declared the same party for seller (data element 3/25) and exporter (data element 3/1).

The seller details are only required where the seller is a different party to the exporter.

Where the seller is a different party to the exporter and holds a recognised EORI number, enter the seller’s EORI number in data element 3/25.

en: You have used an additional procedure combination (data element 1/11) incorrectly. Additional procedure codes 1IL and 1LV can only be used for goods dispatched/exported from a third country
cy: Rydych wedi defnyddio cyfuniad gweithdrefn ychwanegol (elfen ddata 1/11) yn anghywir. Dim ond ar gyfer nwyddau syân cael eu hanfon / allforio o drydedd wlad y gellir defnyddio codau gweithdrefn ychwanegol 1IL a 1LV

en: When declaring any of the authorisation types CGU, EUS, IPO or TEA in data element 3/39, it is necessary to declare document code C505 (Customs Comprehensive Guarantee) in DE 2/3. It may be necessary to declare C505 together with a waiver status code such as XW
cy: Wrth ddatgan unrhyw fath o awdurdod CGU, EUS, IPO neu TEA yn elfen ddata 3/39, mae angen datgan cod dogfen C505 (Gwarant Tollau Cynhwysfawr) yn DE 2/3. Efallai y bydd angen datgan C505 ynghyd Ã¢ chod statws ildiad megis XW

en: When declaring Additional Procedure Code F75, the destination country must be a Special Fiscal Territory or other territory with which the EU has formed a Customs Union

en: When using additional procedure code E01 (simplified procedure value) or E02 (standard import value), data element 4/9 additions and deductions, must not be declared.  See Appendix 1 for more information

en: You declared a fixed rate of exchange meaning a contractually agreed rate of exchange was used. The invoice value (data element 4/14) on an import declaration or the total amount invoiced (data element 4/11) on an export declaration, needs to be declared in GBP, converted using the agreed rate

en: The value you declared may not be less than 100%. The Additions/Deductions code is a percentage and so the value provided in data element 4/9 must be less than 100
cy: The value you declared may not be less than 100%. The Additions/Deductions code is a percentage and so the value provided in data element 4/9 must be less than 100.

en:
Additional document code, for example licence, exemption or authorisation number, is not allowed or must not be declared with other data in the declaration.

Examples include C512 and C514 (SDP and EIDR authorisations) not permitted with certain procedure codes; licence document code restrictions with certain additional procedure codes, Special Procedure authorisations required with certain procedure combinations
cy:
Nid yw cod y dogfen ychwanegol, er enghraifft trwydded, eithriad neu rif awdurdodi, yn cael ei ganiatÃ¡u neu maeân rhaid peidio Ã¢âi ddatgan gyda data eraill yn y datganiad.

Mae enghreifftiauân cynnwys C512 a C514 (awdurdodiadau SDP ac EIDR) na chaniateir gyda chodau gweithdrefn penodol; cyfyngiadau ar god dogfen y drwydded gyda rhai codau gweithdrefn ychwanegol, awdurdodiadau Gweithdrefn Arbennig syân ofynnol gyda chyfuniadau gweithdrefnau penodol

en:
You may not have declared an authorisation required for this declaration type. If you have declared the correct authorisation, check the authorisation number declared on the 'Additional documentation' page.

For SDP declarations, you need document code C512 For EIDR declarations, you need document code C514 For submitting an arrived export declaration, data element 3/39 must include one of the authorisation type codes CSE or EXRR.

You may have declared an authorisation that has expired; or the reference number does not belong to the party on the declaration; or the reference number provided is not recognised
cy:
Efallai nad ydych wedi datgan awdurdodiad syân ofynnol ar gyfer y math hwn o ddatganiad. Os ydych wedi datgan yr awdurdodiad cywir, gwiriwch y rhif awdurdodi a ddatganwyd ar y dudalen âDogfennau ychwanegolâ.

Ar gyfer datganiadau SDP, mae angen cod dogfen C512 arnoch Ar gyfer datganiadau EIDR, mae angen cod dogfen C514 arnoch Ar gyfer cyflwyno datganiad allforion sydd wedi cyrraedd, maeân rhaid i elfen ddata 3/39 gynnwys un oâr codau math o awdurdod CSE neu EXRR.

Efallai eich bod wedi datgan awdurdodiad sydd wedi dod i ben; neu nid ywâr cyfeirnod yn perthyn iâr parti ar y datganiad; neu nid ywâr cyfeirnod a roddir yn cael ei adnabod

en: Additional Information codes declared together for one item are not compatible
cy: Nid ywâr codau Gwybodaeth ychwanegol a ddatganwyd gydaâi gilydd ar gyfer un eitem yn cydweddu

en: Invoice value declared in data element 4/14 must be greater than 0
cy: Maeân rhaid i werth anfoneb a ddatganwyd yn elfen ddata 4/14 fod yn fwy na 0

en:
The deferment account number you have provided is not recognised or the account may be suspended/revoked or Parties declared on the declaration do not have authority to use account number provided.

Check the CDS financial dashboard/contact HMRC deferment department
cy:
Nid yw rhif y cyfrif gohirio yr ydych wediâi roi yn cael ei adnabod neu maeân bosibl bod y cyfrif wediâi atal/wediâi ddirymu neu nid oes gan y PartÃ¯on a ddatganwyd ar y datganiad yr awdurdod i ddefnyddio rhif y cyfrif a roddir.

Gwiriwch ddangosfwrdd ariannol CDS/cysylltwch ag adran ohirio CThEF

en: If the MUCR was given to you, check it is in a valid format. If you created it yourself, check the guidance on the correct format, given in the completion guide
cy: Os rhoddwyd yr MUCR i chi, gwiriwch ei fod mewn fformat dilys. Os gwnaethoch ei greu eich hun, gwiriwch yr arweiniad ar y fformat cywir, a roddir yn y canllaw ar gyfer cwblhau

en:
If the MUCR was given to you, check it is in a valid format. If you created it yourself, check the guidance on the correct format given in data element 2/1 in the completion guide.

If you have declared a previous declaration reference such as for an import, check the DUCR on the previous declaration
cy:
Os rhoddwyd yr MUCR i chi, gwiriwch ei fod mewn fformat dilys. Os byddwch wediâi greu eich hun, gwiriwch yr arweiniad ar y fformat cywir a roddir yn elfen ddata 2/1 yn y canllaw ar gyfer cwblhau.

Os ydych wedi datgan cyfeirnod datganiad blaenorol megis ar gyfer mewnforio, gwiriwch y DUCR ar y datganiad blaenorol

en: Country of export is mandatory at header or item level when declaring additional procedure code 1CD, 1CG, 2CG or 2CD. On a C21I with procedure code 0002, 0003, 0004, 0005, 0006 or 0007
cy: PLEASE MANUALLY REPLACE WITH WELSH

en:
The additional procedure code declared requires this declaration to have indirect representation (data element 3/21).

The representative status declared in data element 3/21 would show Indirect, code ‘3’. The representative status declared in data element 3/21 indicates the relationship between the representative and the importer, not the sub-agent and any other party
cy:
The additional procedure code declared requires this declaration to have indirect representation (data element 3/21).

The representative status declared in data element 3/21 would show Indirect, code ‘3’. The representative status declared in data element 3/21 indicates the relationship between the representative and the importer, not the sub-agent and any other party.

en: You have declared more than one MUCR at header level on your import declaration.
cy: Rydych wedi datgan mwy nag un MUCR ar lefel y pennyn ar eich datganiad mewnforio.

en:
These additional procedure codes cannot be used with an EIDR C21 declaration.

1CD - Controlled drugs using Simplified Procedures
1CG - Controlled Goods using Simplified Procedures.

Ni ellir defnyddioâr codau gweithdrefn ychwanegol hyn gyda datganiad EIDR C21.

1CD - Cyffuriau rheoledig gan ddefnyddio Gweithdrefnau Symlach
1CG - Nwyddau Rheoledig gan ddefnyddio Gweithdrefnau Symlach.

en: An authorisation number, such as for a Special Procedure, SDP, EIDR, CCG, national authorisation, is either not valid or is not authorised for use by the party given on the declaration

en:
Licence ID cannot be declared more than once on the same item.
Additional procedure codes cannot be repeated on the same item.
The same origin sub-role code cannot be repeated on the same item.
ARC number cannot be used on multiple export declarations.
Addition and Deduction codes cannot be repeated at header level or within a single item.
Goods item number cannot be repeated on the declaration
cy:
Ni ellir datgan Dynodydd y drwydded fwy nag unwaith ar yr un eitem.
Ni ellir ailadrodd codau gweithdrefnau ychwanegol ar yr un eitem.
Ni ellir ailadrodd yr un cod is-rÃ´l tarddiad ar yr un eitem.
Ni all ddefnyddio rhif ARC ar fwy nag un datganiad allforio.
Ni ellir ailadrodd codau Ychwanegu a Didynnu ar lefel y pennyn neu o fewn eitem unigol.
Ni ellir ailadrodd y rhif eitem o nwyddau ar y datganiad

en: For example, the same Additional TARIC or National additional code has been declared twice for one item

en: This could be a formatting error or a code incorrectly completed

en: A value that is required by the commodity code has not been completed. For example, supplementary unit. You need to check the 'Measures' column for the commodity code on the Trade Tariff
cy: Nid yw gwerth syân ofynnol gan y cod nwyddau wediâi gwblhau. Er enghraifft, uned atodol. Mae angen i chi wirioâr golofn âMesurauâ ar gyfer y cod nwyddau ar y Tariff Masnach

en: You need to check the 'Conditions' box for the commodity code on the Trade Tariff. If you do not hold any licence, you must decide if you can declare a waiver (usually a Y-code). Instructions for how to use the code are given in Appendix 5A
cy: You need to check the 'Conditions' box for the commodity code on the Trade Tariff. If you do not hold any licence, you must decide if you can declare a waiver (usually a Y-code). Instructions for how to use the code are given in Appendix 5A.

en: The licence or exemption required for these goods is missing. You need to check the 'Conditions' box for the commodity code on the Trade Tariff. If you do not hold any licence, you must decide if you can declare a waiver (usually a Y-code). Instructions for how to use the code are given in Appendix 5A

en: Value is not allowed to be used for the given commodity code. You need to check the 'Measures' box for the commodity code on the Trade Tariff. If you do not hold any licence, you must decide if you can declare a waiver (usually a Y-code). Instructions for how to use the code are given in Appendix 5A

en: Additional Information code NIDOM when used on one item must be entered on all items

en:
This could be because:

licence does not match the commodity code
licensing authority declared is incorrect
licence is out of date licence allows insufficient quantity
licence reference number declared is incorrect
licence does not belong to the importer/ exporter declared
licence is not valid for the country of origin/ dispatch/ destination
licence does not match the DUCR declared in DE 2/1

If still stuck, contact the licensing authority

en:

en:
Document status code "EL" or "EP" is not allowed on a single use licence.
The licence can only be used once so cannot be part used
cy:
Nid yw cod statws y ddogfen "EL" neu "EP" yn cael ei ganiatÃ¡u ar drwydded ddefnydd untro.
Dim ond unwaith y gellir defnyddioâr drwydded, felly ni ellir ei defnyddioân rhannol

en: Licence declared has been made inactive, check correct licence is declared or contact issuing authority

en: You have declared an invalid Licence for the declared Country of Origin
cy: Rydych wedi datgan Trwydded annilys ar gyfer y Wlad Darddiad ddatganedig

en: Licence not valid for declared country of dispatch
cy: Nid ywâr drwydded yn ddilys ar gyfer datgan gwlad anfon

en: Document Status Code "EA" can only be used on a supplementary declaration
cy: Dim ond ar ddatganiad atodol y gellir defnyddio Cod Statws y Ddogfen "EA"

en: A licence document code (for example X002, 9106) cannot be declared on this type of declaration, even if using a waiver/exemption document status code. If the goods are entitled to a waiver/exemption and there is a waiver document code which can be used in place of the licence document code (for example Y903, Y927), then this can be used instead. If there is no waiver document code that can be used then it may be necssary to use a standard declaration
cy: Ni ellir datgan cod dogfen y drwydded (er enghraifft X002, 9106) ar y math hwn o ddatganiad, hyd yn oed os ydych yn defnyddio cod statws ildiad / eithriad y ddogfen. Os oes gan y nwyddau hawl i ildiad/eithriad a bod cod dogfen ildiad y gellir ei ddefnyddio yn lle cod dogfen y drwydded (er enghraifft Y903, Y927), yna gellir defnyddio hwn yn lle. Os nad oes cod dogfen ildiad y gellir ei ddefnyddio yna efallai y bydd angen defnyddio datganiad safonol

en: Instructions for how to declare document codes are given in Appendix 5A
cy: Rhoddir cyfarwyddiadau ar sut i ddatgan codau dogfen yn Atodiad 5A

en: In some cases, when you declare a document status code to indicate a waiver for a licence, you are still required to enter a '0' as the the quantity attributed to the licence. This will also require a measurement unit such as GBP
cy: Mewn rhai achosion, pan fyddwch yn datgan cod statws y ddogfen i ddangos ildiad ar gyfer trwydded, mae o hyd yn ofynnol i chi roi â0â fel y swm a briodolir iâr drwydded. Bydd hyn hefyd yn gofyn am uned fesur fel GBP

en: Check appendix 5A for more information
cy: Gwiriwch atodiad 5A am ragor o wybodaeth

en: You have not provided a DUCR - this is required at header level for an import declaration with a licence.
cy: Nid ydych wedi rhoi DUCR - mae angen hyn ar lefel y pennyn ar gyfer datganiad mewnforio gyda thrwydded.

en: The Y series document code used requires a document reason. Check appendix 5A for the information required
cy: Mae cod dogfen cyfres Y a ddefnyddiwyd yn gofyn am reswm dros y ddogfen. Gwiriwch atodiad 5A am yr wybodaeth sydd ei hangen
